item.description:
Hey Everyone,

Sorry for not updating this event sooner.... I was away last week on Business and didn't have a chance.

It turns out that the member that was hosting the event is unable to host the event right now. I am sorry for the short notice. Instead we'll be meeting for dinner and/or beverages at a restaurant/pub near the Beacon Hill. I hope you can still make it. If you need to find the group please call or text me at 617-459-5145.

See you soon!

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian June Meeting
